profileAlternative.name: Sander Mak
profileAlternative.headline: Director Of Technology at Picnic Technologies
profileAlternative.summary:
I am an experienced software designer and developer with excellent analytical skills. Additionally, I have experience in being a technical lead and architect during the complete software lifecycle from inception to production. Pushing the frontier on both the backend (event-sourcing, data science) and frontend (for example using TypeScript) every day!

My interests are broad but revolve mainly around the JVM ecosystem. Emerging languages like Scala and TypeScript have my full attention. By following the leading edge of software development I keep learning and growing. Meanwhile, I contribute back by sharing knowledge at conferences like JavaOne, QCon, Jfokus, GeeCON and more. My blog can be found at http://branchandbound.net.

A small selection of talks I've given:
- Event-sourced architectures with Akka (JavaOne 2014, J-Fall 2014, Jfokus 2015)
- TypeScript: coding JavaScript without the pain (JavaOne 2014, GeeCON 2015, DevNation 2015)
- The ultimate dependency manager shootout (QCon New York 2014)
- Data Science with R for Java Developers (J-Fall 2013, JavaOne 2013, won a JavaOne Rockstar award for this talk)
- Modular Javascript in an OSGi world (QCon New York 2014)

For more talks and links to videos, checkout http://branchandbound.net/talks.html

Specialties: Java expert, TypeScript, Scala development, software architecture and service orientation, system integration.

positions.title: Director Of Technology
positions.description: Picnic is the world's fastest growing online supermarket that makes grocery shopping simple, fun, and affordable for everyone. Innovation through technology plays a key role in making this happen: be it our apps, our Java-based backend, or advanced analytics.

positions.title: Independent (Studio/Live) Sound Engineer
positions.description: Working free-lance as both a record mixer and recording studio technician, and as a live sound engineer on various projects.

positions.title: Luminis
positions.description: Software architecture is the act of purposely balancing opposing forces. Experience and knowledge are key to ensuring our clients get the software they deserve. As a Luminis fellow, I have a strong focus on sharing knowledge both within Luminis and externally.

positions.title:
Title
Fellow, Software Architect
positions.description: Software architecture is the act of purposely balancing opposing forces. Experience and knowledge are key to ensuring our clients get the software they deserve. As a Luminis fellow, I have a strong focus on sharing knowledge both within Luminis and externally.

positions.title:
Title
Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Building scalable and modular software on top of our open-source Amdatu stack. Architected an international product for the educational market.

positions.title: Lead developer/Software Architect
positions.description: Java and software architecture consultant for government and financial clients. Leading development teams towards high-quality solutions with flexible architectures.

positions.title: Integration developer (Java)
positions.description: Applying enterprise integration patterns to streamline the interaction of components within a document analysis system. Involved with architecture, design and implementation of an Apache Camel based integration solution.

positions.title: Java architect/developer
positions.description:
Worked as developer on a large banking-related application. Being the project's integrator as well, responsibilties included streamlining the codebase and build, overall quality monitoring and release management.

In subsequent projects I took on the role of architect/lead dev., creating SOA components with Java/Spring.
…
see more

positions.title: Java developer
positions.description: Worked on two different projects for the Dutch police organisation. Technologies: J2EE, Spring, Hibernate and others

positions.title: Lead developer
positions.description: Worked as lead developer on 'Online Digital Assistance' application for migraine research, mainly consisting of Java web applications and J2ME software for Palm PDA's.

given.text:
Sander is the man to have on your project. He is able to deliver the solutions you ask for, starting with only high level requirements. Through some initial discussions about the broad architecture of the solution, Sander comes up with a pragmatic and suitable solution taking also into account the level of complexity. He discovers issues before they materialize. Not only is Sander able to set these guideline he is also very much capable of driving the implementation home. In short, Sander is the man for the job.
…
See more

Sander is a skilled engineer and software craftsman. An excellent presenter and writer as well. He is someone that you can send for a message. Ability to work on a complex problem alone and come up with a solution that will fit your needs.

received.text: Bert is a technology-driven and ambitious person. While working as  Technology Manager Java he provided ample opportunities for growth and guidance to the Java group within Info Support, not in the least because of his expansive network in the Java world. Working with Bert was an all around good experience.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Director of People at Picnic supermarkets
Oracle Software Engineer at Adaption Business Software
